name: Robert's Dream
description:
Controls:

Arrows: Movement

Z: Interact

Hold M: See checklist

Credits

Art*, Music and Code was done by myself.

*Exception for font: https://www.pentacom.jp/pentacom/bitfontmaker2/gallery/?id=357

Synopsis:

Go around town and find the parts needed to find the Robot. Take them back to your room and interact with the center area to start building.

Item Locations

This will spoil the game! Use if stuck:

  • Wire: Jane's house
  • Battery: Pete's house
  • Oil: Cars near Meowchanics
  • Metal: On top of monument above Lab. Interact with multiple times
  • Wheel: Find egg around lake and then talk to Goose
Game Jam Entry:

This was made for the godot game wild game jam 53. I mostly made this as a challange to make some art work and try and out some new things I hadn't done in a game before. That's why the game play aspect isn't really that interesting! The main challange was making all the art, and I vastly underestimated how long it would take so it is not as developed as I would have liked!

Oh well, there is always next t
